About Me

Work

Always building. Always learning.

My current personal project "posthaste" is a lightweight browser native point of sales interface for individuals/small business
Built using React/Redux, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, Auth0 and Stripe for payment processing
"The Board Room"" is a three person group project created to allow real time white board style collaboration across groups and teams.
Built using React/Redux, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, WebSockets and
HTML5 Canvas.
